content: this crochet pattern don t contain the crocheting lessons you should have the basic crochet skills skill level - medium skills required magic_ring single_crochet increase decrease chain slip_stitch also basic sewing and embroidery techniques you will need 1 yarn yarn art jeans 90 red 52 green 70 brown alize cotton gold 01 milky 2 crochet hook 3 yellow thread for embroider seeds 4 fiberfill 5 scissors 6 needle for embroidery and sewing pieces
